short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that adds a countdown to any video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The 1234 extension adds a customizable countdown to any video. Simply set the count value (N), and the extension will count from 1 to N before playing the video. Users can also specify a start time for the video and set a BPM (beats per minute) for the countdown.

- Custom Countdown: Set a count value (N) and watch the extension count from 1 to N before playing your video.
- Start Time Selection: Choose the exact time to start your video, allowing you to skip intros or specific parts.
- Adjustable BPM: Set the beats per minute for the countdown, tailoring the speed to your preference.
- Broad Compatibility: Works with most online video players, ensuring a seamless experience on your favorite sites.
- Ideal for Musicians: Perfect for musicians and those learning to play instruments, helping them practice with precise timing.
